statements: SELECT * FROM risk_management_logs;
SELECT log_id, action_taken, event_date, market_event FROM risk_management_logs;
SELECT action_taken, market_event FROM risk_management_logs WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM risk_management_logs ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM risk_management_logs;
SELECT * FROM risk_management_logs WHERE market_event = 'Market Crash';
SELECT log_id, event_date FROM risk_management_logs WHERE event_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM risk_management_logs WHERE action_taken LIKE '%review%';
SELECT DISTINCT market_event FROM risk_management_logs;
SELECT log_id, event_date, market_event, action_taken FROM risk_management_logs ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_management_actions;
SELECT action_description, action_date FROM risk_management_actions;
SELECT * FROM market_events WHERE event_type = 'Financial Crisis';
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM market_events WHERE event_type = 'Stock Market Crash';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM market_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_management_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT action_description, market_event_type FROM risk_management_actions WHERE action_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT action_id, action_date FROM risk_management_actions WHERE market_event_type = 'Market Crash';
SELECT * FROM risk_management_actions JOIN market_events ON risk_management_actions.market_event_type = market_events.event_type;
SELECT action_description AS action, market_event_type AS event_type FROM risk_management_actions WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MarketEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM MarketEvents WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM MarketEvents WHERE event_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM RiskActions JOIN MarketEvents ON RiskActions.event_id = MarketEvents.event_id WHERE action_type = 'Mitigation' ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT action_id, risk_level FROM RiskAssessments WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM MarketEvents
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM MarketEvents WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM MarketEvents WHERE event_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT ra.action_id, ra.action_type, ra.action_date, ra.action_description, ma.event_name FROM RiskActions ra INNER JOIN MarketEvents ma ON ra.event_id = ma.event_id

SELECT ra.action_id, ra.action_type, ra.action_date, rr.risk_level, rr.assessment_date FROM RiskActions ra INNER JOIN RiskAssessments rr ON ra.action_id = rr.action_id WHERE rr.risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY rr.assessment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementActions;
SELECT action_description, action_date FROM RiskManagementActions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT rm.action_description, re.event_description FROM RiskManagementActions rm JOIN MarketEvents re ON rm.market_event_id = re.market_event_id;
SELECT rca.category_name, ra.assessment_description FROM RiskCategories rca JOIN RiskAssessments ra ON rca.risk_category_id = ra.risk_category_id;
SELECT * FROM MarketEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementActions WHERE action_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY action_date DESC
SELECT action_description, action_date FROM RiskManagementActions WHERE risk_management_action_id = 'abc123'
SELECT * FROM MarketEvents WHERE event_date < NOW() AND event_description ILIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM RiskCategories WHERE category_name = 'Cybersecurity'
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessments JOIN RiskCategories ON RiskAssessments.risk_category_id = RiskCategories.risk_category_id
SELECT * FROM MarketEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description FROM MarketEvents WHERE event_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM MarketEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT impact_id, event_id, impact_description FROM MarketImpact WHERE impact_value > 1000;
SELECT log_id, action_id, log_date FROM RiskActionLog WHERE action_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM MarketEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type FROM MarketEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_description, event_type FROM MarketEvents WHERE event_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT action_id, action_description, severity_level FROM RiskActions ORDER BY severity_level DESC;
SELECT log_id, event_id, action_id, log_date FROM MarketEventLog WHERE event_id = 1001;
